New Records: Jokic recorded a triple-double with 23 points, 17 rebounds, and 15 assists, becoming the first player in NBA history to achieve 20+ points, 15+ rebounds, and 15+ assists in under 30 minutes.
Key Match Events: The Nuggets scored 40 points in the first quarter.
The Hawks rallied from down nine early in the second to lead 62-57 before Denver responded to take a 74-71 lead at halftime.
Porter and Murray hit from 3-point range and Westbrook made a driving layup to quickly extend the lead to 84-75 in the first three minutes of the third quarter.

Miscellaneous Highlights: Jaden Ivey sustained what appeared to be a serious leg injury in a collision with the Magic's Cole Anthony.
